.`` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to all employees Wednesday. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. Steve Ballmer also said in his e-mail that Amithabh Srivastava, a senior vice president for Server and Tools who seemed the heir apparent, is leaving. It's unclear where Srivastava will go next. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

Young of Richmond thinks Mike Pence made the right decision.`` My hope is that he runs for governor. I think it's rather fortuitous that it's open at this particular time,'' Young said. I think it's obvious that he wants to serve in perhaps a higher capacity. Young, who has met with Mike Pence locally and in his Washington, D.C., office, said Mike Pence would do well if elected governor, but Indiana would miss his presence in Congress.
